title: Naked and Marooned with Ed Stafford
resume: Ed Stafford is undertaking an extreme survival challenge. Washed up naked and alone on a desert island south east of Fiji, with only his brain, bare hands, and a camera to keep him alive. He'll take no food, water, clothes, knife or tools, so from the moment he arrives he is on an extraordinary race to stay alive.
